data.message: Ezzalin Sidek has hacked my Facebook page and has taken over as the administrator. Help! She doesn't even speak English or live in the US. What can I do?

replies.message: Hi Nina. If your Page was hacked, please make sure to follow these instructions: http://bit.ly/2s0s5Od. -Jessica

Facebook  hi there how do i verify my hotel page parkroyal yangon official Please get back to me as fast as possible

 PARKROYAL YANGON TEAM

Hi Nicholas. We’re currently only accepting verification requests from Pages that represent celebrities, public figures, sports teams, media and entertainment. Please keep in mind that most Pages and profiles, including local businesses, aren't eligible for verification at this time. You can learn more at: http://bit.ly/2sEgvVU. -Jessica
Eu de ce nu pot sa fac vidio
